text: Ani tya kahi tharavika divasammadhye (‘tasarika’cya divasanta) allahace smarana kara.1 Dona divasantaca gha'i karanaryanvara kahi gunha nahi, ani jo mage rahila tyacyavarahi kahi gunha nahi. He allahace bhaya rakhanaryankarita ahe ani allahace bhaya balagata raha ani laksata theva ki tumhi sarva tyacyacakade ekatra (jama) kele jala
